Title: Monitoring, Tracing & Alerting

Owner: Claude Code

Description:
Integrate metrics, distributed tracing, dashboards, and incident playbooks.

Tasks:
- Instrument services with metrics & traces
- Create Grafana dashboards & alerts
- Create incident playbooks and runbook tests

Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboards live and alerts firing during simulated incidents

Labels: observability, monitoring, priority:medium
